attributes.action: Introduce mandatory, regular drug testing for MPs, Lords & their staff.
attributes.additional_details:
There is very low confidence in Parliament as a result of apparent high drug use & zero accountability for drug abuse.

It is against the public interest to have MPs with a drug dependency problem, and it leaves them open to blackmail.

Further, it is not helpful to the individual to ignore potential or prove drug use - proper rehabilitation should be offered to offenders.
attributes.background:
Propose & adopt legislation within Parliament for regular, randomised drug testing.

Legislation has long been passed for other areas & should also apply to representatives & staff.
